longBusinessSummary.0: The India Cements Limited produces and sells cement and cement related products in India. It offers cement and allied products under the Sankar Super Power, Coromandel King, and Raasi Gold brands, as well as the Coromandel White and Coromandel Super brands; and ready mix concrete. The company also engages in the generation of power from windmills and thermal power plants; provision of ship hiring services; and ownership and operation of coal mines. It exports its cement and clinker to various markets internationally. The India Cements Limited was incorporated in 1946 and is based in Chennai, India.
